name: Project: Scoober
description:
Aliens have overtaken a space station on the moon!

Take down as many as possible to get the highest score!

Controls:

Move Player: Arrow Keys

Move Cursor: Arrow Keys while Z is held down

Shoot: Press X when Z is held down

Enter starts the game, Shift resets the game when you lose

This is my first game, and it will probably see a few updates. It started as a proof-of-concept demo of a larger concept but turned into its own addicting little arcade game. This is also the first in a series of small experimental 1-bit games I hope to develop called Achromatic Bloom. Report any bugs/suggestions/high-scores in the comments!
